dlentry.dt: Create a DITA XML topic for installing a fictonal application

dd.p: Installing an application named Emerald on Mac OS using the DMG installer.Generates:

p.codeblock:
Installing Emerald on Mac OS

To install the Emerald application on Mac OS, you will need to use the DMG installer.

Follow the steps below to complete the installation:

  1. Download the Emerald DMG installer from the official website.
  2. Locate the downloaded DMG file in your Downloads folder.
  3. Double-click the DMG file to open it.
  4. A new window will appear showing the contents of the DMG file.
  5. Drag the Emerald application icon to the Applications folder icon.
  6. Wait for the copying process to complete.
  7. Once the copying is finished, you can close the DMG window.
  8. Navigate to the Applications folder on your Mac.
  9. Locate the Emerald application and double-click it to launch.

The Emerald application is now installed on your Mac OS. You can start using it by launching it from the Applications folder.
